blogs.title: Ways to Co-Sleep Safely
blogs.body: Be a light sleeper, use pillows for boundries, don't do drugs or drink lots of alcohol, have baby on top of you.
blogs.author: Renee

blogs.title: How to Dad: The First Few Months
blogs.body: Support your wife, be there for your kid, play with them, change the dipers, start the bath, be present, have fun
blogs.author: Austin

blogs.title: Teething! 5 Things To Expect
blogs.body: Everything goes in their mouth, you need to get some gel, it can take several weeks, comes and goes in phases, they come in two at a time!
blogs.author: Renee

blogs.title: The First Three Things to Feed Your Baby
blogs.author: Renee
